item.title: XMRbin.com - Crypto Pastebin
item.description: A markdown pastebin that allows anyone to easily get their own custom page and URL, and use it to accept Monero payments. Each custom markdown page gives you the ability create your own custom payment buttons and manage Monero invoices. Every invoice allows the creator and page owner to message each other. Page owners can withdraw their balance instantly and edit their page at anytime.
